name: Climate Change: Gravity Edition
description:
FIRST GAME JAM.

This game is submitted for a 48 hour game jam, and the theme is "Reverse Gravity."

The initial concept was to have a player trying to climb there way DOWN. Time constraints got the best of me. :-/ 

Although I'm not proud of the game's outcome, I'm proud of the work that I put in to design the game.

The penguins have found out that climate change is a hoax, they decided to find out what other science is FAKE.

Avoid the penguins, and climb the clouds.

There are only 2 levels.
